TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ListSourceHelper extends System.Object
public ref class ListSourceHelper abstract sealed

summary.span: 在实现由 接口定义的成员时，由数据源控件使用。

span.span: Used by data source controls when implementing the members defined by the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个实用工具类，提供简化的实现由数据源控件的接口。The class is a utility class provided to simplify implementation of the interface by data source controls. 数据源控件实现接口，但不是扩展类可以使用静态中定义的方法自己实现的方法接口。Data source controls that implement the interface but do not extend the class can use the static methods in their own implementations of the methods defined by the interface. 数据源控件扩展从类自动继承这些方法实现。Data source controls that extend from the class inherit these method implementations automatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现的数据源类的设计模式方法。The following code example demonstrates the design pattern for a data source class that implements the methods. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Controls.IListSourceHelper#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Controls.IListSourceHelper/CS/somedatasource.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Controls.IListSourceHelper#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Controls.IListSourceHelper/VB/somedatasource.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法的实现中方法，传递到数据源控件的引用。Use this method in an implementation of the method, passing a reference to a data source control. 对象，它将返回实现接口。The object that is returned implements the interface. 可以使用方法来检索一系列对应的描述符从列表中的数据源控件关联的名称。You can use the method to retrieve a list of descriptors that correspond to the names associated with the data source control from the list. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现的数据源类的设计模式方法。The following code example demonstrates the design pattern for a data source class that implements the methods. 方法调用静态方法。The method calls the static method.
